title: Chef John on Family Recipes, Fulfilling Food Wishes, and Finding YouTube Fame
description:
Between YouTube and Allrecipes, Chef John Mitzewich of Foodwishes has gained millions of followers for his approachable recipes and videos. In this episode of Homemade, Chef John talks with Martie Duncan about growing up in western New York, making cabbage rolls and perfect barbecued chicken, and the ingredient that inspired a drinking game.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
